hero.title: Websites & platforms for funded education and research projects.
hero.description: Project leads are under time pressure, with fixed budgets and extensive obligations. We deliver a project website with custom design, legal safety, and support for the entire lifecycle.
hero.subline: The fixed price is EUR 8,500 incl. VAT, and you receive the first draft after just 4 weeks.
hero.promiseText: Custom design, legal safety, and support across the entire lifecycle.

logos.label: These organizations rely on our solutions

problem.eyebrow: If you want impact, you cannot be slowed down.
problem.title: Internal solutions cost your project time, visibility, and energy
problem.description: What creates stability in large organizations becomes a hurdle for dynamic funded projects. Rigid structures and requirements block speed, flexibility, and impact.

first.title: Design without room for individuality
first.text: Rigid templates force uniform appearances and your project loses distinctiveness and visibility.

second.title: Approvals that take forever
second.text: Lengthy sign-offs and implementation cycles disrupt timelines and jeopardize deadlines.

third.title: Overload in the project team
third.text: Without experience, teams must teach themselves CMS workflows, content maintenance, and legal requirements.

fourth.title: Support without real ownership
fourth.text: There are contact points, but no one takes responsibility, especially after the project ends.

offer.eyebrow: The complete solution for your project website
offer.title: Custom project website with fixed price and lifecycle support
offer.description: You receive the first draft in your project design within 4 weeks. The fixed price gives you full cost control regardless of your project runtime. Technology, support, and legal requirements are covered. Your website becomes a reliable foundation for public outreach and project success.

images.first: Mobile view of the fAIr Research homepage with logo, slogan, short description, and two action buttons.
images.second: Mobile view of the fAIr Research homepage with logo, slogan, short description, and two action buttons.

first.label: Design
first.title: Custom project design
first.text: A dedicated color palette, typography, and visual elements for your project.

second.label: Logo
second.title: Logo wordmark included
second.text: You receive a project-specific logo consisting of a wordmark and icon.

third.label: Content
third.title: Typical content types included
third.text: Homepage, project, team, publications, events, blog, downloads, and more ready to use.

fourth.label: Fixed price
fourth.title: No recurring payments
fourth.text: Pay once and receive support for the full duration, even if the project runs for years.

fifth.label: WordPress
fifth.title: Independent content maintenance in WordPress
fifth.text: A simple backend lets you and your team update all content independently.

sixth.label: Training
sixth.title: Training with video recording
sixth.text: Live onboarding for content editing. The session is recorded and accessible anytime.

seventh.label: Compliance
seventh.title: Legally and technically secured
seventh.text: GDPR-compliant, accessible to BITV standards, with complete imprint and privacy pages.

eighth.label: Support
eighth.title: Hosting and support until project end
eighth.text: Updates, backups, security, bug fixes, email support, and disaster recovery are included.

archive.title: Project archive online: a site remains permanently accessible
archive.description: After the project ends, we convert your WordPress site into a low-maintenance HTML version with an archive notice. We deploy it to your organization's server or webspace and connect the domain.

images.first: Archive view of a project site with filters and search.
images.second: Archive view with list and detail layout.

first.title: Permanent availability
first.text: Your results remain accessible online even after the project ends.

second.title: No maintenance effort
second.text: Static HTML pages require no updates or ongoing care.

third.title: Legally secured
third.text: Archive notice, imprint, and privacy pages remain fully included.

fourth.title: Easy integration
fourth.text: We deploy the site to your server or webspace and connect the domain.

testimonials.title: What project teams say about us
testimonials.description: Feedback from funded education and research projects.

first.name: Nils Steffen
first.quote: With bombig.net we found a competent partner who knows how to showcase scientific projects digitally. Our websites coronarchiv.de, SocialMediaHistory.de, and Orte-der-Unsichtbarkeit.de show how historical research gains visibility and relevance in public space through strong design and innovative technical solutions. Working with Deniz and Jannis combines academic precision with creative design and helps make historical research attractive and accessible to a broad audience.

second.name: Sophie Leukel
second.quote: On behalf of the Federal Ministry of Research, Technology and Space, we at DLR Project Management supported the funded project "Im Namen der Freiheit" by the University of Hamburg as part of the Science Year 2024 - Freedom. With theater assemblies, freedom workshops, and the digital collection archive, the project "Im Namen der Freiheit" fostered exchange about freedom with the goal of strengthening social cohesion. The agency Bombig built, designed, and implemented the website freiheitsarchiv.de - the heart of the project. In the collaboration, Bombig showed not only technical skill but also impressive proximity to the content: a robust, scalable, user-centered website with an archive that is sustainably usable and offers added value for science. We recommend the collaboration without reservation.

third.name: Prof. Dr. Christian Bunnenberg
third.quote: The collaboration with the 'Bombigs' was always solution-oriented and constructive. Our ideas were implemented professionally in shared exchange, and the technical and design execution contributed significantly to the project's success. Gladly again!

fourth.name: Marie-Denise Kalle
fourth.quote: For the funded project Im Namen der Freiheit of the University of Hamburg as part of the Science Year 2024 - Freedom, we at neues handeln AG took on the communications support on behalf of the Federal Ministry of Research, Technology and Space. The project website was delivered by the web agency Bombig - Deniz and Jannis - and we could not have wished for better partners. The collaboration was uncomplicated, creative, and absolutely reliable. With a strong sense for design and functionality, they picked up our ideas, developed them further, and translated them into a modern, compelling website. Thank you for the great effort, and we wholeheartedly recommend Bombig.

fifth.name: Katrin & Gunter
fifth.quote: Our website looks exactly the way we want it to, runs reliably, and is always reachable. The support from bombig.net is timely and dependable. We feel very well taken care of.

sixth.name: Catharina Koehnke
sixth.quote: In the coronArchivare project, we faced the challenge of engaging young people in political education and historical research. Graphics and the website were an important foundation for the project. We were very happy to gain bombig as a reliable and competent partner - Deniz and Jannis found creative solutions and implemented them in a focused way. Working with bombig was always very pleasant and absolutely smooth.

seventh.name: Dr. Janina Kriszio
seventh.quote: Im Namen der Freiheit was a complex project with many stakeholders. The website was an important tool both externally and internally to structure processes. Jannis and Deniz/bombig.net managed to deliver the website with equal sensitivity to process and focus on goals, so that it became a driver for the entire project.

eighth.name: Hannah Rentschler
eighth.quote: Working with Bombig is ideal for us as an association. Jannis and Deniz developed our corporate design including a new logo, designed marketing materials, and re-conceived our website according to our wishes. Technical support has been extremely reliable for years, and they are always reachable even for quick questions. The price-performance ratio is very fair, and dealing with the two of them is always friendly and uncomplicated. We feel completely well supported and warmly recommend Bombig without reservation!

ninth.name: Jan Krawczyk
ninth.quote: We worked with Jannis and Deniz, among other things, on the project Street I Art I Democracy. In discussions about functionality and especially the website's design and CD - which were particularly important for this project - we quickly arrived at good and realistic ideas in a joint brainstorming. The result speaks for itself! We now have not only a platform that brings together key use cases for us such as a crowdsourcing archive, a section for educational materials, and a blog, but the design language also fits the project and target group perfectly. Even after the project ended, we continue to get positive feedback on the website. Thanks to Jannis and Deniz for the great collaboration!

addons.title: Add-ons expand your project website
addons.description: If your project needs more functions, you can add them. Each add-on has a fixed price, is delivered within a few weeks, and integrates seamlessly into your website.

first.label: Map module
first.title: Map module
first.text: Interactive map with geo pins for places, posts, or events. Ideal for regional initiatives or citizen-science projects.

images.first: Mobile view of the map module with pins.
images.second: Mobile view of the map module with detail view.

second.label: Archive module
second.title: Archive module
second.text: We build a searchable online archive with navigation, tags, and filters, ideal for projects with documents, images, or video.

images.first: Mobile view of the archive module in grid view.
images.second: Mobile view of the archive module with filters.

third.label: Podcast module
third.title: Podcast module
third.text: We integrate your podcast directly on the project site, prepare cover art and description, and handle integration with Spotify, Apple, and more. You only provide the audio files.

images.first: Mobile view of the podcast module with player.
images.second: Mobile view of the podcast module with episode list.

projects.title: Experience across many projects
projects.description: Over the last seven years we delivered more than a dozen project websites with universities, associations, and funding programs. These experiences form the foundation of our current offer.

finalCta.eyebrow: More questions or a custom request?
finalCta.title: Book a 30-minute intro call
finalCta.description: In 30 minutes we explain how our project websites are structured, whether your initiative fits our modules, and which next steps make sense. We provide pragmatic estimates on timeline and scope and answer questions about existing sites or new ideas. Free and without obligation, even without an active project.

hero.title: A studio built for teams who refuse to be forgettable.
hero.description: We are a tight, senior team that blends strategy, design, and build. Our focus is simple: help ambitious brands launch with clarity, confidence, and momentum.

items.first: Clarity beats noise. Every page should say one thing remarkably well.
items.second: Design earns attention, but performance earns trust.
items.third: Storytelling belongs in every interaction, not just the copy.

leadership.label: Leadership
leadership.title: Design, strategy, and engineering in one room.
leadership.description: You work directly with the people shaping the work, not a handoff chain.

method.label: Method
method.title: Short, focused sprints with weekly milestones.
method.description: Momentum stays high, feedback stays real, decisions stay sharp.

momentum.label: Momentum
momentum.title: Launches that feel inevitable, not improvised.
momentum.description: We set up your team for continuous improvement after go-live.

team.title: Small, senior, and intentionally built.
team.description: We keep the team lean so every engagement stays close, consistent, and accountable.

items.second: Conversion-led landing pages and marketing sites
